"Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor - This classic rock song would be the perfect opening track to set the tone for a motivational and inspiring soundtrack. It's all about perseverance and pushing through challenges, which is exactly what you did by starting the assignment later than expected.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem is all about finding your inner strength and roaring back to life. It would be a great addition to your soundtrack as it captures the resilience and determination you've shown in completing the assignment despite the time crunch.

"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - This iconic song has become a anthem for perseverance and optimism, and its catchy chorus would be the perfect addition to your soundtrack. It's a reminder that even when things get tough, you should keep on believing and pushing forward.

"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This intense and motivational rap song would be a great addition to your soundtrack, as it speaks to the determination and drive you need to overcome obstacles and achieve your goals. The lyrics are all about channeling your emotions and using them to fuel your success.

"We Are the Champions" by Queen - This classic anthem is the perfect way to end your soundtrack, as it celebrates achievement and success. It's a reminder that you've worked hard and deserves to be proud of yourself, and it would be a great way to reflect on all the challenges you've overcome to complete the assignment.
